title: riot if youre going to be retarded, at least make an option to force self-mute

replies.body:
> YOU CAN GET FUCKING REPORTED AND PUNISHED SIMPLY FOR SAYING "GG."

Really? Can you show us one case where someone saying "GG" was the cause of their punishment?
There is an option to self mute, it's called never hitting the enter button! Granted that takes some level of self control!
I find extreme irony in the OP's name and his strong desire to forcefully ignore what people say that he doesn't like.

>TAKE SOME OF THE RETARDENESS OUT  

So ban you?

Again, i muted myself long ago, when i was tilted easely.

I bound the chat to a keyboard key and then disabled that key.

Bottom line is you have the /mute all function. Use it at the start of a match and you never have to listen to anyone say anything to you ever again.

You have no excuse.
